page.description: The {XMARGIN} command sets the left and right margins of the Xdialog. Unless otherwise specified, the measurement is in terms of the default font, which is Arial 8 point.

argument.name: Left
argument.description: Numeric. The number of characters to use as the left margin of the Xdialog.

argument.name: Right
argument.description: Numeric. The number of characters to use as the right margin of the Xdialog.
